verses.verse: And it came to pass that<WH3414>, when Jeremiah had made an end<WH3615> of speaking<WH1696> unto all the people<WH5971> all the words<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> their God<WH430>, wherewith Jehovah<WH3068> their God<WH430> had sent<WH7971> him to them<WH1697>, even all these words,

then spake<WH559> Azariah<WH5838> the son<WH1121> of Hoshaiah<WH1955>, and Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Kareah<WH7143>, and all the proud<WH2086> men<WH582>, saying<WH559> unto Jeremiah<WH3414>, Thou speakest<WH1696> falsely<WH8267>: Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430> hath not sent<WH7971> thee to say<WH559>, Ye shall not go<WH935> into Egypt<WH4714> to sojourn there<WH1481>;

but Baruch<WH1263> the son<WH1121> of Neriah<WH5374> setteth thee on<WH5496> against us<WH4616>, to deliver<WH5414> us into the hand<WH3027> of the Chaldeans<WH3778>, that they may put us to death<WH4191>, and carry us away captive<WH1540> to Babylon<WH894>.

So Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Kareah<WH7143>, and all the captains<WH8269> of the forces<WH2428>, and all the people<WH5971>, obeyed<WH8085> not the voice<WH6963> of Jehovah<WH3068>, to dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Judah<WH3063>.

But Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Kareah<WH7143>, and all the captains<WH8269> of the forces<WH2428>, took<WH3947> all the remnant<WH7611> of Judah<WH3063>, that were returned<WH7725> from all the nations<WH1471> whither they had been driven<WH5080>, to sojourn<WH1481> in the land<WH776> of Judah<WH3063>;

the men<WH1397>, and the women<WH802>, and the children<WH2945>, and the king<WH4428>'s daughters<WH1323>, and every person<WH5315> that Nebuzaradan<WH5018> the captain<WH7227> of the guard<WH2876> had left<WH3240> with Gedaliah<WH1436> the son<WH1121> of Ahikam<WH296>, the son<WH1121> of Shaphan<WH8227>; and Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030>, and Baruch<WH1263> the son<WH1121> of Neriah<WH5374>;
and they came<WH935> into the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>; for they obeyed<WH8085> not the voice<WH6963> of Jehovah<WH3068>: and they came<WH935> unto Tahpanhes<WH8471>.
Then came the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> unto Jeremiah<WH3414> in Tahpanhes<WH8471>, saying<WH559>,

Take <WH3947> great<WH1419> stones<WH68> in thy hand<WH3027>, and hide<WH2934> them in mortar<WH4423> in the brickwork<WH4404>, which is at the entry<WH6607> of Pharaoh<WH6547>'s house<WH1004> in Tahpanhes<WH8471>, in the sight<WH5869> of the men<WH582> of Judah<WH3064>;

and say<WH559> unto them<WH559>, Thus saith Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>: Behold<WH7971>, I will send and take<WH3947> Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, my servant<WH5650>, and will set<WH7760> his throne<WH3678> upon<WH4605> these stones<WH68> that I have hid<WH2934>; and he shall spread<WH5186> his royal pavilion over them<WH8237>.

And he shall come<WH935>, and shall smite<WH5221> the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>; such as are for death<WH4194> shall be given to death<WH4194>, and such as are for captivity<WH7628> to captivity<WH7628>, and such as are for the sword<WH2719> to the sword<WH2719>.

And I will kindle<WH3341> a fire<WH784> in the houses<WH1004> of the gods<WH430> of Egypt<WH4714>; and he shall burn<WH8313> them<WH7617>, and carry them away captive: and he shall array<WH5844> himself with the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, as a shepherd<WH7462> putteth on<WH5844> his garment<WH899>; and he shall go forth<WH3318> from thence in peace<WH7965>.

He shall also break<WH7665> the pillars<WH4676> of Beth-shemesh<WH1053>, that is in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>; and the houses<WH1004> of the gods<WH430> of Egypt<WH4714> shall he burn<WH8313> with fire<WH784>.
